subject: Latest preference for organzing test package
msgSnippet: Hi guys, I did search the group for an answer to my question, but could not find any clear opinions. The JUnit FAQ also has a preference on organization but
messageBody:
Hi guys,
I did search the group for an answer to my question, but could not find any clear opinions. The JUnit FAQ also has a preference on organization but that has not been updated since 2006. Also, if some people had adopted a particular method, have you had any regrets and wished you had adopted the another method?

My question:What is a preferable method to place our JUnit tests.

Method A
----------
MyPackage
src
com
mycompany
MyClass.java

test
com
mycompany...etc
MyClassTest.java

Method B
-----------
MyPackage
src
com
mycompany...etc
MyClass.java

MyPackageTest
src
com
mycompany...etc
MyClassTest.java
